meta.description: The WHO has been handling the COVID-19 outbreak in a specific matter. It went from downplaying the virus and lobbying against travel bans from China to pushing for the constant lockdown of the world and its economy. There's a method behind the madness: The WHO is using the pandemic to move towards a New World Order that is modeled after China's oppressive regime.

title: The True Agenda of the WHO: A New World Order Modeled After China
